column2: Lake appeared to turn green and visilbility was very poor; a very unusual condition for this lake!  Concern was voiced from many residents and a water sample was sent in.  The diagnosis was diatoms.  The question is- what caused this?
Gorgeous!!  Ran out of rope on the secchi disk at 30 ft.
mild wind- sunny- water is cloudy
